description: This file defines the AgentQLTools class, which provides methods for scraping website content using the AgentQL library and Playwright. It includes functions for standard and custom scraping based on provided queries, handling environment variables, and browser automation.

classes.name: AgentQLTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for scraping websites using AgentQL and Playwright, with support for custom queries and environment variable configuration.

methods.name: scrape_website
methods.description: Scrapes all text content from a specified website URL using AgentQL and Playwright.

methods.name: custom_scrape_website
methods.description: Scrapes website content using a custom AgentQL query provided during class instantiation.
